item.title: Jessica add a quote by Andrew Peterson
item.description: "Love is not a feeling in your chest; it is bending down to wash another's feet." -- Andrew Peterson

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Jessica add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jessica add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "If we find ourselves with a desire that nothing in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that we were made for another world." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jessica add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A man can no more diminish God's glory by refusing to worship Him than a lunatic can put out the sun by scribbling the word 'darkness' on the walls of his cell." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Evelyn was an insomniac so when they say she died in her sleep, you have to question that." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "You get old and you realize there are no answers, just stories." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Dietrich Bonhoeffer
item.description: "Discipleship is not an offer that man makes to Christ." -- Dietrich Bonhoeffer

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Dietrich Bonhoeffer
item.description: "We are not to simply bandage the wounds of victims beneath the wheels of injustice, we are to drive a spoke into the wheel itself." -- Dietrich Bonhoeffer
